class.name: GrooveJoint2D
class.description: Groove constraint for 2D physics. This is useful for making a body "slide" through a segment placed in another.

members.member: The body B's initial anchor position defined by the joint's origin and a local offset [member initial_offset] along the joint's y axis (along the groove). Default value: [code]25[/code]
The groove's length. The groove is from the joint's origin towards [member length] along the joint's local y axis. Default value: [code]50[/code]
